name: Season 1: Episode 9
headline: Immune Mediated Cardiac Toxicities: Diagnostic challenges, management and novel discoveries.
hosts: Join our hosts Dr. Afreen Shariff and Dr. Tian Zhang as they discuss with guest expert Dr. Javid Moslehi, MD, Cardiologist, Associate Professor of Medicine and an expert in immune-mediated cardiotoxicities at Vanderbilt University. Dr. Moslehi is also the Director of Cardio-Oncology at Vanderbilt.
